step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your wrists closer together in the next rep.
Your shoulders are moving well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer to your head.
Excellent! Your elbows are wide and shoulders are close to your head.
Great hold! Your shoulders and elbows are well-positioned.
Good return. Focus on keeping wrists closer together as you return to the start.
Good clasp. Try to bring your wrists closer together.
Shoulders look good. Keep elbows a little closer to your head.
Nicely done! Elbows are wide and shoulders are close to your head.
Good hold. Your elbows and shoulders are in a good position.
You're doing great! Focus on bringing your wrists closer together as you return to the starting position.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists closer together throughout the movement, especially when returning to the start. Your shoulder and elbow positioning is excellent, promoting good lymph flow.
